author: Tunku Varadarajan
title: ‘The Duchess’ Review: How to Survive a Royal Romance
text:
Start with a three-part quiz: Which British royal was sent to a hellish boarding school in Scotland, with instructions from his father to the headmaster that the boy’s life be made as tough as possible? Which royal hurled herself down a flight of stairs (in the early stages of pregnancy) in a bid to capture her husband’s attention? Which had a great-grandmother who was a long-term mistress of her present husband’s great-great-grandfather?
The first two woebegone blue bloods are Prince Charles, heir to the British throne, and...
